solution_line_template: During the heavy rain, the tank collects {inflow_rate} * {rain_duration} = <<{inflow_rate}*{rain_duration}={rainwater_collected}>>{rainwater_collected} L of water
The tank has a total of {initial_water} + {rainwater_collected} = <<{initial_water}+{rainwater_collected}={total_water}>>{total_water} L of water
